ygData.subject: Re: Haven't posted in a long time, but...
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL!  Me too!  I dinged 50 on Friday with 56 and a half days played. Created on March 17th though, day after release ;) Gratz! ~Beatdrop Battledrum 50th Bard
ygData.messageBody:
LOL! Me too! I dinged 50 on Friday with 56 and a half days played.
Created on March 17th though, day after release ;)

Gratz!

~Beatdrop Battledrum
50th Bard of the Karana Server

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Laluni Songhammer" <sklug@s...> wrote:
> DING! Level 50, with some 47 and a half days played. Birth date
of
> character, March 16th (first day of EQ retail) at 1:30PM PST.
>
> DING occurred on a sarnak knight in Frontier Mountains.
>
> Laluni Songhammer Half-Elf Level 50 Bard of E'Ci
> (Damn, E'Ci must have more high level bards than any other server.)
